[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/room/inherit/carriage/testcar.c

This method should be overriden by higher level carriages to setup the driver correctly.

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/basic_room.c

This class includes the following files /include/room/carriage.h
